Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a solo home run in the first inning to drive in his 100th run of the season
The Royals scored twice in the fifth inning
The Pirates scored their lone run in the fifth on an RBI single by Oneil Cruz
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals won for the seventh time in nine games since a seven-game losing streak
The Royals assured themselves of their first winning season since 2015

Others: Michael Wacha improved to 9-1 with a 2.68 ERA in 13 starts since the beginning of July

Mitch Keller lost for the fifth time in his last six decisions
